tiddler.title: SpecialTiddlers
tiddler.pre:
''These are the pre-defined tiddlers used by giewiki, most of which have default content that serves a special purpose.'' |<>|This shadow tiddler provides access to several advanced options.| |<>|These values in this shadow tiddler determine the colour scheme of the user interface| |<>|Dialog for creating pages| |<>|The tiddlers listed in this shadow tiddler will be automatically displayed when the page loads| |<>|Dialog for defining a user group| |<>|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler determines how tiddlers look while they are being edited| |<>|Menu which is inserted into the right sidebar when you have edit rights| |File list|Auto-generated list of uploaded files| |<>|A help file| |<>|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the main menu in the left-hand column of the screen| |<>|Dialog for changing the address of the current page| |<>|Listed in place of the normal DefaultTiddlers (so as to be rendered) when the user does not have access to the page| |<>|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the options panel slider in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|The dialog for defining page properties (LoD)| |<>|Script used by the the dialog for defining page properties (LoD)| |<>|The top-level tiddler you see here| |<>|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler determines the overall page layout.
//This is a separate concept from the [[Page template|PageTemplateHelp]] mechanism//| |<>|A help file describing the Page templating mechanism| |<>|This shadow tiddler provides access to the plugin manager| |RecentChanges|Auto-generated list of the most recent changes| |RecentComments|Auto-genertated list of the most recent comments| |Recycle bin|Auto-generated list of 'deleted' tiddlers| |<>|Presents your search history using ~SearchHistoryScript (LoD)| |<>|Script for presenting your search history (LoD)| |<>|Invokes the search macro to display the search dialog| |<>|The user interface to setting search options| |<>|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the option panel in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the tabs panel in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|Autogenerated map of all pages that have ''//not//'' been tagged as hidden| |<>|This shadow tiddler is used as the second part of the page title^^*^^| |<>|This shadow tiddler is used as the first part of the page title^^*^^| |<>|This shadow tiddler should be set to the full target URL for publication| |<>|Used as part of the PageSetup dialog| |<>|This list| |<>|Used as part of the PageSetup dialog| |<>|This tiddler can contain custom CSS definitions| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions related to the color of page elements.
''DO NOT EDIT THIS TIDDLER'', instead make your changes in the StyleSheet shadow tiddler| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions related to the layout of page elements.
''DO NOT EDIT THIS TIDDLER'', instead make your changes in the StyleSheet shadow tiddler| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions related to the translation locale| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions for printing| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'All' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'More' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Missing' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Orphans' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Shadowed' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Tags' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Timeline' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |<>|This special tiddler contains optional content to be displayed in the top-right corner| |<>|This shadow tiddler determines which commands are shown in tiddler toolbars| |<>|Presents a file upload dialog| |<>|Appears at the top of the right sidebar when (having logged in) you click your username| |<>|Dialog for defining personal settings| |<>|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler is used for presenting system dialogs| |<>|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler determines how tiddlers look|
(*: SiteTitle & SiteSubtitle: use these if you want the changes to be versioned, otherwise set these via the PageProperties)

tiddler.title: LoD
tiddler.pre: !LoD (Load-on-demand) Certain special tiddlers are loaded only on demand and do not appear in the list of special Tiddlers that's available on the right.
